MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy, affecting properties in Tyn Y Groes, Llechwedd and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repairs required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:02PM on 23rd February 2021.
